articles.description: Travis County got the most at 14,650 doses. No other county in our area got even half that. That’s almost exactly the amount of doses that Travis County has averaged over the first five weeks of the vaccine rollout.
articles.content: AUSTIN (KXAN) — Central Texas got thousands more doses of the COVID-19 vaccine this week, the sixth week of the vaccine rollout. The Week 6 allocation of the vaccine sent 26,775 doses of the vaccine … [+4040 chars]
